response.original_title: Rumba In the Jungle: The Return
response.overview: Rumba in the Jungle - The Return' is a glimpse into the world of competitive DanceSport in South Africa through a world renowned dance competition, hosted in Sun City, South Africa that after 1999, went defunct. As it returns 18 years later, we follow two legendary dance icons as they prepare a new generation of dancers for the competition that once launched their own dance careers.
response.title: Rumba In the Jungle: The Return
